original_title: 未亡人下宿？ その4 今昔タマタマ数え歌
overview: [Showa Edition] Ozaki, who is in the 10th year of the university ronin, came to the boarding house introduced at the boarding house, but there is a boarding house where the widow Yuko (Kaoru Kira), who has a large amount of debt, is working alone. So ...  [Heisei edition] Ozaki heads for the exam, but the perpetrator is Miyuki (Reno Aihira), who runs a boarding house, and shakes the stick for a year ...  [Reiwa] Disappointed to find out that the widow's boarding house has disappeared, Ozaki finds a share house run by a woman named Alisa (Chisa Hasegawa) ...
title: Mibôjin geshuku? Sono 4: Konjaku tamatama kazoeuta
